decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The proposal hereby granted permission shall be carried out and completed in full accordance with the approved plans within six months of the date of this permission. Failure to comply within this timeframe may result in enforcement action.
REASON: To represent a reasonable period of time to regularise the existing unauthorised development.

Condition : 2 - Unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority, the development shall be carried out, retained and completed in accordance with the following approved drawings and documents:
2021152.PA102 Rev. P01, 2021152.PA103 Rev. P02, 2021152.PA105 Rev. P02
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the roof of the existing building.
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Alterations to rear dormer; installation of rooflights in front roofslope (retrospective)
